name: Ritual Of Inches: The Final Tug
name_original: Ritual Of Inches: The Final Tug
description: The gods need appeased and the volcano growls! Which tribe will please the gods with a sacrifice and spare their village from annihilation?! The Ritual of Inches is all about rhythm. Play along with the song beats and cheer on your champion: he must tug as hard as he can to steal the sacrifice from the other tribe and plunge it deep into the heart of the volcano. Then the ritual will be fulfilled and the gods will smile upon you!
